Introduction

YDPP (Korean: 와이디피피; Japanese: ワイディピピ) was a project boy group formed by Starship Entertainment and Brand New Music for a one-time promotion. They made their official debut in April 5, 2018 with the song "Love it Live it."

Current state:
disbanded
